## ScreenReaderClient.on() method

Registers a listener for the `close` event, that will be called when the connection to the screen reader is closed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(event: "close", listener: () => void): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | "close" | <code>&quot;close&quot;</code> |
|  listener | () =&gt; void | function to be called with the error<!-- -->The listener can removed with [ScreenReaderClient.off()](./assistive-playwright-client.screenreaderclient.off.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
